actions.name: Force-Empowered Rend
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. Hit: 1d8 + PB force damage.

actions.name: Repair (3/Day)
actions.description: The magical mechanisms inside the defender restore 2d8 + PB hit points to itself or to one construct or object within 5 feet of it.

reactions.name: Deflect Attack
reactions.description: The defender imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of one creature it can see that is within 5 feet of it, provided the attack roll is against a creature other than the defender.

actions.name: Force Strike
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + PB force damage.

reactions.name: Channel Magic
reactions.description: The homunculus delivers a spell you cast that has a range of touch. The homunculus must be within 120 feet of you.

actions.name: Flamethrower
actions.description: Exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 2d8 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Force Ballista
actions.description: Make a ranged spell attack, originating from the cannon, at one creature or object within 120 feet of it. On a hit, the target takes 2d8 force damage, and if the target is a creature, it is pushed up to 5 feet away from the cannon.

actions.name: Protective Field
actions.description: The cannon emits a burst of positive energy that grants you and each creature of your choice within 10 feet of it a number of temporary hit points equal to 1d8 + your Intelligence modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half the spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Maul
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + PB + SpellLevel force damage.

actions.name: Force Strike
actions.description: Melee Spell Attack, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1d8 + SpellcastingAbilityModifier force damage.

actions.name: Sting
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half on a success.

actions.name: Sting
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is instead unconscious.

actions.name: Claws
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or take 5 (2d4) poison damage and become poisoned for 1 minute.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack. Hit: 1 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute.

actions.name: Bear Spirit Aura
actions.description: You and your allies gain temporary hit points equal to 5 + your druid level and have advantage on Strength checks and saves.

actions.name: Hawk Spirit Aura
actions.description: You can use your reaction to grant advantage to an ally's attack roll. You and your allies have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks.

actions.name: Unicorn Spirit Aura
actions.description: When you cast a spell that restores hit points, each ally in the aura regains hit points equal to your druid level.
